title: Catherine Great and Stalin as westernizers

content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.Compare and contrast the extent to which Catherine the Great and Joseph Stalin were "Westernizers."

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.Compare and contrast the extent to which Catherine the Great and Joseph Stalin were "Westernizers."

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
